text: Thomas Muster was the two-time defending champion and successfully defended his title, defeating Fernando Meligeni in the final, 7–6(7–4), 7–5. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==References== * Main draw (ITF) * Main draw (ATP) Abierto Mexicano Telcel - Singles 1995 Abierto Mexicano Telcel
title: 1995 Abierto Mexicano Telcel – Singles
